briefdescription.para: An alias describing the type of a coordinate (e.g. a coordinate in phase-space (x, vx)).

detaileddescription.para: This file contains aliases for DDC. The documentation for DDC can be found at https://ddc.mdls.fr/. The names used in the DDC project are not always intuitive for mathematicians/physicists therefore Gysela has chosen to introduce this file to provide names that are hopefully more intuitive. The documentation for these concepts can be found in the Gysela documentation at: https://gyselax.github.io/gyselalibxx/docs_DDC_in_gyselalibxx.html

briefdescription.para: An alias describing the type of an index that is used to access the values of a field defined on a grid.
An alias describing the type of a distance between two indexes.
An alias describing the type of an index range describing the subsection of a grid on which a field is defined.

memberdef.type: ddc::Chunk< ElementType, IdxRange, ddc::KokkosAllocator< ElementType, MemSpace > >
memberdef.definition: using FieldMem = ddc::Chunk<ElementType, IdxRange, ddc::KokkosAllocator<ElementType, MemSpace> >
memberdef.name: FieldMem

briefdescription.para: An alias describing the type of an object which will allocate memory for a field when it is created.
An alias describing the type of an object which will allocate memory for a field of doubles when it is created.

memberdef.definition: using Field = ddc::ChunkSpan<ElementType, IdxRange, LayoutStridedPolicy, MemorySpace>
memberdef.name: Field

briefdescription.para: An alias describing the type of a field defined on a grid (e.g. the electric field defined on the grid ${x_0, x_1, .., x_N}$)

memberdef.definition: using DField = Field<double, IdxRange, MemorySpace, LayoutStridedPolicy>
memberdef.name: DField

briefdescription.para: An alias describing the type of a field of doubles defined on a grid (e.g. the electric field defined on the grid ${x_0, x_1, .., x_N}$)

memberdef.definition: using ConstField = ddc::ChunkView<ElementType, IdxRange, LayoutStridedPolicy, MemorySpace>
memberdef.name: ConstField

briefdescription.para: An alias describing the type of a constant field defined on a grid (e.g. the electric field defined on the grid ${x_0, x_1, .., x_N}$)

memberdef.definition: using DConstField = ConstField<double, IdxRange, MemorySpace, LayoutStridedPolicy>
memberdef.name: DConstField

briefdescription.para: An alias describing the type of a constant field of doubles defined on a grid (e.g. the electric field defined on the grid ${x_0, x_1, .., x_N}$)
An alias describing the type from which a uniform grid must inherit.
An alias describing the type from which a non-uniform grid must inherit.

memberdef.type: typename detail::GetSplineBatchedBuilder1D< ExecSpace, BSplines, InterpolationGrid, BCLBound, BCUBound, SolverType, IdxRangeType >::type
memberdef.definition: using get_spline_batched_builder1d_t = typename detail::GetSplineBatchedBuilder1D< ExecSpace, BSplines, InterpolationGrid, BCLBound, BCUBound, SolverType, IdxRangeType>::type
memberdef.name: get_spline_batched_builder1d_t

briefdescription.para: An alias for creating a 1D spline builder based on GetSplineBatchedBuilder1D class.

memberdef.type: typename detail::GetSplineBatchedBuilder2D< ExecSpace, BSplinesX1, BSplinesX2, InterpolationGridX1, InterpolationGridX2, BCLBoundX1, BCUBoundX1, BCLBoundX2, BCUBoundX2, SolverType, IdxRangeType >::type
memberdef.definition: using get_spline_batched_builder2d_t = typename detail::GetSplineBatchedBuilder2D< ExecSpace, BSplinesX1, BSplinesX2, InterpolationGridX1, InterpolationGridX2, BCLBoundX1, BCUBoundX1, BCLBoundX2, BCUBoundX2, SolverType, IdxRangeType>::type
memberdef.name: get_spline_batched_builder2d_t

briefdescription.para: An alias for creating a 2D spline builder based on GetSplineBatchedBuilder1D class.

memberdef.type: typename detail::GetSplineBatchedEvaluator1D< ExecSpace, BSplines, InterpolationGrid, LowerExtrapolationRule, UpperExtrapolationRule, IdxRangeType >::type
memberdef.definition: using get_spline_batched_evaluator1d_t = typename detail::GetSplineBatchedEvaluator1D< ExecSpace, BSplines, InterpolationGrid, LowerExtrapolationRule, UpperExtrapolationRule, IdxRangeType>::type
memberdef.name: get_spline_batched_evaluator1d_t

briefdescription.para: An alias for creating a 1D spline evaluator based on GetSplineBatchedEvaluator1D class.

memberdef.type: typename detail::GetSplineBatchedEvaluator2D< ExecSpace, BSplinesX1, BSplinesX2, InterpolationGridX1, InterpolationGridX2, LowerExtrapolationRuleX1, UpperExtrapolationRuleX1, LowerExtrapolationRuleX2, UpperExtrapolationRuleX2, IdxRangeType >::type
memberdef.definition: using get_spline_batched_evaluator2d_t = typename detail::GetSplineBatchedEvaluator2D< ExecSpace, BSplinesX1, BSplinesX2, InterpolationGridX1, InterpolationGridX2, LowerExtrapolationRuleX1, UpperExtrapolationRuleX1, LowerExtrapolationRuleX2, UpperExtrapolationRuleX2, IdxRangeType>::type
memberdef.name: get_spline_batched_evaluator2d_t

briefdescription.para: An alias for creating a 2D spline evaluator based on GetSplineBatchedEvaluator2D class.
